attributes.action: ban the supply of  plastic carrier bags in stores to encourage customers to use carriers such as bags-for-life made from natural materials or a bag brought from home.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to see the supply of plastic bags banned to enforce people to use sustainable and environmentally friendly options such as fabric bags which have a practically unlimited life span. Stores could have a supply of recycled paper bags at a small cost for customers who need/wish to use these. We believe the government must take responsibility for this as it is a significant environmental issue.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
